summary: The story of a Spanish priest sent to a mission in India and his fight to establish Catholic religion against adversities while fighting a plague epidemic.
cast: Fernando Fernán Gómez|Sara Montiel|Enrique Guitart|Rafael Romero Marchent|Antonio Almorós|Alberto Romea|Julia Caba Alba|Rafael Bardem|Luis Pérez de León|Santiago Rivero|Fernando Sancho|Miguel Bolsinsky|Félix Briones|Manuel Kayser|Manuel San Román|Casimiro Hurtado|José María Mompín
director: Director: José Luis Sáenz de Heredia
title: La mies es mucha
